util.spring.io

Class FifoResourceLoaderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.spring.io.FifoResourceLoaderAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.core.io.ResourceLoader, LociResourceLoader

    public class FifoResourceLoaderAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LociResourceLoader
    Uses a given ResourceLoader to implement a "first-available" strategy to determine from which location to load a resource.

    • Method Detail

      • selectResource

        public java.util.Optional<org.springframework.core.io.Resource> selectResource(ResourceLocation... loci)
        Uses the underlying ResourceLoader to select the first available resource out of the possible locations. In detail, this method will select the resource at loci[k] with k the minimum index for which the following conditions are met:
        • loci[k] is not null or empty
        • the resource at loci[k] exists and is readable
        If none of the resources at the given locations satisfy this condition or no locations are given, then empty is returned.
        Specified by:
        selectResource in interface LociResourceLoader
        Parameters:
        loci - the possible locations of the resource.
        Returns:
        a handle for the resource at the location selected out of the possible choices; note that, as with any other ResourceLoader, obtaining a handle does not imply the existence of the resource. It may turn out that none of the given locations is suitable to load the resource in which case an empty optional is returned.

      • getResource

        public org.springframework.core.io.Resource getResource(java.lang.String location)
        Just forwards to the underlying ResourceLoader.
        Specified by:
